objects.text:
• Premium thickened canvas material
• Multiple pockets for organization
• Structured design stands by itself

Perfect for work, travel, college,
beach days and everyday use

product_details.description: 💗【Original Designed Brand】Original designed brand,exquisite production technology,thickened canvas material,large capacity multi-pocket practical.Strong structure can hold over 40 pounds,can stand by itself own.Reject cheap and low-quality malicious imitation. 💗【Mutil Pockets】The canvas tote bag with 2 front pockets can put cellphone,Watter bottle,keys,and wallet convenient access at any time,1 big pockets behind the bag can put ipad to pass the time when bored. 💗【Structured Bag】The purse can upright on by itself own,easy to place on the desktop or floor at any time and keep the contents of the bag from spilling.Use thick quality canvas, strong and rugged. 💗【Large Capacity】Square design,high space utilization,suitable for books and documents,in addition to everyday use,it is also suitable for work and college.can used as laptop computer teacher work nurse travel beach gym gift book bag. 💗【Removable and Adjustable Shoulder Strap】The crossbody messenger bag with removable and adjustable shoulder strap,handbag tote bag also crossbody bag. 💗【Magnetic Closure】The women purses and handbags designed with magnetic closure,easy to take things from inside the bag and put things,but also can help to protect privacy and prevent theft. Fabric type - Canvas ** Care instructions - Machine Wash ** Origin - Imported ** Country of Origin - China **

banner_details:
This banner showcases a stylish and functional canvas tote bag with a clean and modern layout. The background is divided into two soft pink tones, the left side being more saturated and the right side in a muted blush, separated by a vertical dashed line. A dot pattern adds texture behind the text, and minimalist abstract line shapes are placed on the right for visual balance. The left section features multiple text layers including a bold heading (`heading`), a pink tagline (`tagline`), a feature description list (`description`), a large price (`price`), and a rounded call-to-action button comprised of a shape (`cta_background`) and centered text (`cta`). A supporting statement (`subheading`) sits beneath the button. The right side presents a high-resolution image of the product (`product_image`). The composition is visually balanced with informative and commercial elements clearly segmented.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Blush (#FFF5F7)
- Pastel Pink (#FFC0CB)
- Highlight Pink (#FF6B8E)
- Light Rose (#FFB6C1)
- Accent Pink (#FF8AA6)
- Dark Charcoal (#333333)
- Medium Gray (#555555)
- Light Gray (#777777)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image presents a soft, pastel aesthetic characterized by a muted blush pink canvas material, which dominates the visual space and creates a calm, feminine appeal. The primary color is a light pink (#F4AEBB), subtly blended with lighter shades such as baby pink (#FAD4D8) and hints of warm neutral tones like pale peach (#F9CFCF). The consistent fabric texture gives depth and uniformity, while shadows along the pockets and edges add dimension without harsh contrast. Metal hardware in a subtle silver (#B0B0B0) offers a balancing cool tone. This color palette suits clean, modern ad banners with a gentle, inviting feel.
